answers.answer: Hello,What you seem to be having is called polyuria. It can be due to excessive consumption of fluids, intake of diuretic fluids like caffeine, chocolate, coffee, tea, soft drinks, hot spicy foods; juices high in acid and alcoholic beverages. It can also occur in UTI, diabetes and high doses of vit C and B2Please check out if there is any intake of the above said medicines or foods.I f the symptoms persist then please get it evaluated from a physician and get ruled out the various medical conditions causing polyuria. I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: for the past few days i have been goign to the toilet about 12 times in around 3 hours. i feel like i need to urinate but only a very small amount comes out. it does not hurt or sting. i dont know what it could be.any help please?
title: urinating too often
